sentences.english: The automotive ergonomic design is one of the important parts duringautomobiles design and development.
sentences.chinese: 汽車人機工程設計是車身設計開發過程中的重要環節。

sentences.english: The forward /reverse switch is designed according to ergonomics allowing the one-handed operation.
sentences.chinese: 反轉切換開關符合人機工程尺寸，可以單手切換操作。

sentences.english: DJ Products can help you determine your ergonomic needs.
sentences.chinese: DJ產品可以幫助您確定您的人機工程需求。

sentences.english: In effect, that's the idea behind ergonomic design.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這是一個很好的人機工程設計背後。

sentences.english: The development of ergonomics in designing and packaging for auto-body.
sentences.chinese: 人機工程在汽車車身佈置設計上的研究發展。

sentences.english: How to identify the Ergonomics risk in Industry and Office?
sentences.chinese: 如何評估生產過程中和辦公室內的人機工程風險？

sentences.english: Perfect man-machine engineering Unscrew perch pin ensures reliable connection.
sentences.chinese: 完美人機工程高位插腳防松設計，使插接更牢靠。
